name: Sign Craft: Simulator
description:
Have you ever saw a sign and thought that it was mondo cool? Ever wanted to learn how to build signs or to simulate the fun of using power tools?

Or do you just like pixely 3D graphics with horrib---"hyper realistic" physics and the simulation of a real world job? Then look no further!

Sign Craft: Simulator is a first-person 3D game that allows you to build your own signs. You start off at a sign shop as an entry level Sign-Technician. In the beginning you complete basic tasks, earning experience which allows your boss to entrust you with more skilled jobs. Includes real-life skill building, such as picking up trash!!



Utilize equipment such as drop saws and wall saws
Cut, weld, squeegee and screw materials together to construct signs
A variety of power and hand tools are at your disposal
A fully functional trash can for throwing away trash
Option to change between wacky imperial and the metric system of measurement

Measure twice, cut once!

Construct your sign-frame

Put it all together



Bored yet? Of course not! There is trash that needs to be picked up. Now go clock in!
